title: Inside the Parker - Underachieving Yanks; More Ohtani History; Alonso's Derby Defense; Goo Gate Debate; Betting on the Bases
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Underachieving Yanks; More Ohtani History; Alonso's Derby Defense; Goo Gate Debate; Betting on the Bases
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob tries to figure out what's wrong with the underachieving Yankees, tells you which historic milestone Shohei Ohtani achieved, and why he's glad Mets slugger Pete Alonso is running it back at the Home Run Derby to defend his crown. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair.

Guests: Writer Branson Wright joins the pod to discuss his recent Undefeated piece on the historic HBCU cafreer of former MLB All-Star Rickie Weeks.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
